text: Hillsport is a locality in the Canadian province of Ontario, located in the Thunder Bay District north of Manitouwadge."The Towns and Cities of Northern Ontario: Hillsport - North of Superior". NorthernOntario.org. The area has a few permanent year-round residents and is the location of a family-owned wilderness recreational lodge currently branded as the Hillsport ."Trophy Black Bear Hunting". Tourism Northern Ontario, September 21, 2010. The area is served by the Hillsport railway station. ==References== Category:Communities in Thunder Bay District
title: Hillsport, Ontario
